Package locationservice.service

Interface GpsService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GpsServiceImpl
    @Service
public interface GpsService
    Service Interface to retrieve users and attractions location and manage distance calculation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addVisitedLocation​(java.util.UUID userId, java.util.List<VisitedLocationDto> visitedLocationDtos)
      Add to the user a list of new visited locations.
      java.util.List<VisitedLocationDto> getAllUserLastVisitedLocation()
      Get the last visited location registered of each user.
      java.util.List<AttractionDto> getAttractions()
      Get the list of attractions.
      double getDistance​(gpsUtil.location.Location loc1, gpsUtil.location.Location loc2)
      Return the distance in miles between two location.
      java.util.List<AttractionWithDistanceDto> getNearbyAttractions​(java.util.UUID userId, int limit)
      Return a list of the nearest attractions and their distance from the user, sorted from the closest to the farthest.
      VisitedLocationDto getUserLastVisitedLocation​(java.util.UUID userId)
      Get the last visited location registered of the user or throws an exception if no location found.
      java.util.List<VisitedAttractionDto> getVisitedAttractions​(java.util.UUID userId)
      Return a list of the visited attractions of the user and the corresponding visited location that was in range of the attraction.
      VisitedLocationDto trackUserLocation​(java.util.UUID userId)
      Track the current location of the user and registered it.

    • Method Detail

      • getUserLastVisitedLocation

        VisitedLocationDto getUserLastVisitedLocation​(java.util.UUID userId)
                                       throws NoLocationFoundException
        Get the last visited location registered of the user or throws an exception if no location found.
        Parameters:
        userId - of the user
        Returns:
        Visited location Dto
        Throws:
        NoLocationFoundException - when no location found

        Returns:
        List of visited location Dto

        Returns:
        current visited location Dto

      • getVisitedAttractions

        java.util.List<VisitedAttractionDto> getVisitedAttractions​(java.util.UUID userId)
        Return a list of the visited attractions of the user and the corresponding visited location that was in range of the attraction.
        Parameters:
        userId - of the user
        Returns:
        List of attractions and corresponding visited location Dto

      • getNearbyAttractions

        java.util.List<AttractionWithDistanceDto> getNearbyAttractions​(java.util.UUID userId,
                                                               int limit)
                                                        throws NoLocationFoundException
        Return a list of the nearest attractions and their distance from the user, sorted from the closest to the farthest. The limit truncate the list to keep only the nearest attractions. The limit can't be negative or would throw an IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        userId - of the user
        limit - number of records
        Returns:
        List of attraction with distance Dto
        Throws:
        NoLocationFoundException - when no user location found
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when limit is negative

      • getDistance

        double getDistance​(gpsUtil.location.Location loc1,
                   gpsUtil.location.Location loc2)
        Return the distance in miles between two location.
        Parameters:
        loc1 - first location
        loc2 - second location
        Returns:
        distance in miles
